parquet.column.values

Class ValuesWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • parquet.column.values.ValuesWriter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BitPackingValuesWriter, BooleanPlainValuesWriter, ByteBitPackingValuesWriter, DevNullValuesWriter, DictionaryValuesWriter, PlainValuesWriter, RunLengthBitPackingHybridValuesWriter

    public abstract class ValuesWriter
extends Object
    base class to implement an encoding for a given column
    Author:
    Julien Le Dem
